thread.title: Andre Barksdale Sr.
thread.title_full: Optima Tax Relief reviewed by Andre Barksdale Sr.

author: Andre Barksdale Sr.
title: Andre Barksdale Sr.
text: I would recommend Optima Tax to everyone who has a tax issue because they are the best at getting the best results. If they need me for anything I would be there to back them up 100% because that's what kind of service that they provided for me results and professionalism.
